title: Constant Composition Expansion
description: A constant composition expansion (CCE) is an isothermal test that establishes the pressure/volume relationship for a fluid system as it may be depleted in a reservoir. Measurements of this test include saturation pressure, relative volume, single-phase densities, and other details depending on fluid type, for example, compressibility (oil), deviation factors (gas), and liquid dropout (condensates) as a fluid sample is progressively allowed to expand with decreasing pressure without removing any of the sample.

SamplesAnalysisID.title: Samples Analysis ID
SamplesAnalysisID.description: The OSDU Identifier for this SamplesAnalysis.

SampleID.title: Sample ID
SampleID.description: The OSDU Identifier for the Sample associated with this analysis.

TestNumber.title: Test Number
TestNumber.description: A number for this test for purposes of e.g., tracking lab sequence.

SaturationPressure.title: Saturation Pressure
SaturationPressure.description: The saturation (or bubble point) pressure measured in this test.

ReservoirPressure.title: Reservoir Pressure
ReservoirPressure.description: The pressure conditions of the reservoir where the sample was collected.

TestSteps.title: Test Steps
TestSteps.description: An array object capturing the CCE test steps.

items.title: Test Steps
items.description: An array object capturing the CCE test steps.

StepNumber.title: Step Number
StepNumber.description: Internal step number which identifies the sequence of step in CCE measurements.

StepPressure.title: Step Pressure
StepPressure.description: The pressure applied during the step.

LiquidVolumeRelativeToSaturationPressure.title: Liquid Volume Relative To Saturation Pressure Volume
LiquidVolumeRelativeToSaturationPressure.description: Volume of liquid relative to the volume at saturation pressure.

OilDensity.title: Oil Density
OilDensity.description: The density of the oil for this test step.

OilCompressibility.title: Oil Compressibility
OilCompressibility.description: The compressibility of the oil for this test step.  Compressibility is a measure of how much a substance can be compressed under pressure.

OilViscosity.title: Oil Viscosity
OilViscosity.description: The dynamic viscosity of the oil for this test step.

TotalVolume.title: TotalVolume
TotalVolume.description: The total volume for this test step.

RelativeVolumeRatio.title: Relative Volume Ratio
RelativeVolumeRatio.description: The measured relative volume ratio = measured volume/volume at Psat.

GasDensity.title: Gas Density
GasDensity.description: The density of the gas for this test step.

GasZFactor.title: Gas Z Factor
GasZFactor.description: The Z factor of the gas for this test step estimated for quality assurance of the laboratory data.

GasCompressibility.title: Gas Compressibility
GasCompressibility.description: The compressibility of the gas for this test step.

GasViscosity.title: Gas Viscosity
GasViscosity.description: The viscosity of the gas phase at this test step.

YFunction.title: Y Function
YFunction.description: The Y-Function acts as a consistency check for CCE experiments of black oil.

SampleTestConditionID.title: Sample Test Condition ID
SampleTestConditionID.description: Identifies the testing condition of the sample fluid, e.g. InitialReservoir, CurrentReservoir, StockTank, InitialSaturation.

PhasesPresent.title: Phases Present
PhasesPresent.description: Identifies the phases of fluid present in the sample, e.g. SeparatorLiquid, FlashedOil, OilWithMud, Gas, ReservoirFluid (references FluidPhasesPresent).

IsothermalFluidCompressibilityAverage.title: Isothermal Fluid Compressibility Average
IsothermalFluidCompressibilityAverage.description: The compressibility of the fluid based on two discrete pressure points.

IsothermalFluidCompressibilityInstantane.title: Isothermal Fluid Compressibility Instantaneous
IsothermalFluidCompressibilityInstantane.description: Instantaneous Compressibility is the fluid compressibility at one pressure point calculated using the continuous nature of pressure-volume relation.

VaporComposition.title: Vapor Composition
VaporComposition.description: Array object capturing the composition of the vapor component of the sample at this test step.

items.title: Vapor Composition
items.description: An array object capturing the composition of the vapor.

ComponentNameID.title: Component Name ID
ComponentNameID.description: Name of the component in the liquid.

RelativeMoleWeight.title: Relative Mole Weight
RelativeMoleWeight.description: Molar mass relative to other components.

MolecularWeight.title: Molecular Weight
MolecularWeight.description: The molecular weight of the component.

MolePercent.title: Mole Percent
MolePercent.description: The molar percentage of the component, if available.
MolePercent.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

MassPercent.title: Mass Percent
MassPercent.description: The mass percentage of the component, if available.

VolumePercent.title: Volume Percent
VolumePercent.description: The volume percentage of the component, if available.

SpecificGravity.title: Specific Gravity
SpecificGravity.description: The specific gravity of the component.

LiquidComposition.title: Liquid Composition
LiquidComposition.description: Array object capturing the composition of the liquid component of the sample at this test step.

items.title: Liquid Composition
items.description: An array object capturing the composition of the liquid.

ComponentNameID.title: Component Name ID
ComponentNameID.description: Name of the component in the liquid.

RelativeMoleWeight.title: Relative Mole Weight
RelativeMoleWeight.description: Molar mass relative to other components.

MolecularWeight.title: Molecular Weight
MolecularWeight.description: The molecular weight of the component.

MolePercent.title: Mole Percent
MolePercent.description: The molar percentage of the component, if available.
MolePercent.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

MassPercent.title: Mass Percent
MassPercent.description: The mass percentage of the component, if available.

VolumePercent.title: Volume Percent
VolumePercent.description: The volume percentage of the component, if available.

SpecificGravity.title: Specific Gravity
SpecificGravity.description: The specific gravity of the component.
